DOC.detailed_description: In France screen cervical cancer ( CC ) usually base opportunistic screen program . French guidance recommend perform smear every 3 year age 25 65 year , 2 initial normal yearly smear . Pap-tests carry medical doctor midwife . The coverage rate estimate 56.6 % 83.0 % . In deprived population , 55 % woman unscreened risk develop CC majored . The gynecologic examination consultation gynecologist appear main barrier pap-test .
